TEXT.English: The people of %s1 have joined the rising civilization of %s2. How should we respond?
Accept their decision.
Declare war and reconquer them!
%d1 of our units have been expelled from %s2 territory and withdrawn to %s3.
[H2]A new civilization is being born[\H2][NEWLINE]Do you wish to take permanent control of the %s1 civilization?
TEXT.French: [H2]Naissance d'une nouvelle civilisation[\H2][NEWLINE]Voulez-vous prendre le contrôle permanent de la civilisation %s1:2 ?
TEXT.German: [H2]Eine neue Zivilisation entsteht[\H2][NEWLINE]Wollt Ihr die permanente Kontrolle über das %s1:3 Volk übernehmen?
TEXT.Italian: [H2]Nasce una nuova civiltà[\H2][NEWLINE]Vuoi assumere il controllo permanente della civiltà %s1:2?
TEXT.Spanish: [H2]Ha nacido una nueva civilización[\H2][NEWLINE]¿Deseas tomar el control permanente de la civilización %s1:2?

TEXT.English: We are receiving reports that the rise of the %s1 civilization is imminent.
Colonists in America are embracing enlightenment ideas and calling for representation and an end to unjust taxation.
The provinces of the Rio de la Plata have formed a congress to declare independence from their motherland.
Nahua speaking peoples are migrating into the Valley of Mexico looking for their prophesied new homeland.
The colonial royal family is establishing an independent branch in Brazil.
Colonial rulers are considering acts that would result in a self-governing confederation in Canada.
Simón Bolívar is rallying pro-independence forces in the colony of New Granada.
The Virginia Company is chartered to bring back riches.
Samuel de Champlain seeks to settle land for the French.
The Cusco tribe is expanding beyond its home valley to begin establishing the Inca Empire.
Independent city states are developing on the Yucatan peninsula.
Officers in colonial Mexico are gathering forces to achieve independence.
Norse settlers are beginning to venture out to the Atlantic.
The Dutch seek to establish trading factories in the New World.
The Portuguese Crown issues orders to found distant Captaincies.
Christopher Columbus sets sail to find a western route to India.
An army of the expanding %s1 has been sighted marching towards %s2!
